mapper.select: SELECT a.book_id , a.book_name , a.book_info , a.isbn , a.published_at , a.price , a.stock_quantity , a.image_url , b.category_id , b.category_name , c.publisher_name , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.author_name ORDER BY e.author_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS authors , SUM(f.quantity) AS ordersCount FROM books a LEFT JOIN book_categories b ON a.category_id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN publishers c ON a.publisher_id = c.publisher_id LEFT JOIN book_authors d ON a.book_id = d.book_id LEFT JOIN authors e ON d.author_id = e.author_id LEFT JOIN order_details f ON a.book_id = f.book_id WHERE a.isbn = #{ isbn } GROUP BY a.book_id
SELECT category_id , category_name FROM book_categories WHERE is_deleted = false;
